Service Details: - Aims to enhance students' campus life and connect them with local accounting professionals- Students can gain practical knowledge of the accounting profession through participation in workshops, volunteering, and networking with industry and public practice professionals- Organizes how-to workshop programs, CPA information sessions, volunteering opportunities through the CRA's Community Volunteer Income Tax Program (CVITP), informal and formal networking events with accounting professionals
Eligibility: All students with an interest in accounting are encouraged to attend, participate, and become actively involved with OCAC events and committees.
